item.title: Creación de Pruebas Unitarias con Spock y Groovy
Herramientas básicas para desarrollo de software
Introducción a React JS
item.description: React JS Library JS: SPA'sCreated by Facebook Components: encapsulate, re-usepresentation: JSX, csslogic: ECS6, state managment Making a react app Pre-requisites: node Install create-react-app: npm install -g create-react-app Create the app: create-react-app blog-app You must replace “blog-app” by your own app name Making first app (part 2) Start the app: Change into folder “blog-app” and execute next command npm start To stop the app just press Ctrl + C Application Structure Application Structure (part 2) node_modules: project dependencies
